title: Post Your Pick 'Em Choices Here!
body:
Hey all.

I'm curious to see what you all think of my choices and am also interested in all of your choices! So lemme no what you guys think!

replies.body:
Bold picks OP! I think your NA teams might be a little high, but anything can happen.

Here's mine:

http://i.imgur.com/4manDEL.png

http://pickem.lolesports.com/share/series/2/user/896456/my-picks

Wouldn't let me attach the image for some reason, anyways I'm pretty confident with these picks! but you never know, some of the teams could unexpectedly completely dominate. Champ Riv pls!
Your Group B is interesting - IG below AHQ - possible but would be quite the upset. I think it's really hard to pick where Fnatic will finish in this group.

> [{quoted}](name=Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=JnEGV9qR,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-09-16T02:06:09.075+0000)
>
> Your Group B is interesting - IG below AHQ - possible but would be quite the upset. I think it's really hard to pick where Fnatic will finish in this group.
 
Yeah, Group B is the one I've been changing around for the past few hours or so. Not exactly 100% with those picks, I'll probably leave the rest though. Hoping Fnatic will keep their streak up!

Well i think it is a bad idea to put Chinese teams like IG and LGD at such a low position. I mean IG is really good and LGD is one of the teams that has a high chance of  winning worlds this year. Other than that Ahq is quite a powerful team.

Anyway here is my picks: http://pickem.lolesports.com/share/series/2/user/1195482/my-picks

You really think H2K are going to finish below the dog balls Bangkok team?

Also, CLG's jungler won't be there due to VISA issues, doubt they will top the group without perfect synergy
Ahh, I didn't know Xmithie wouldn't be there. Still, they are a very strong team, but I may have to change that around.
